title: Just a quick font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124314im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type-id_5636.png)

If you think this is some sort of pixel font, please suggest a close "regular" otf font to replace.  
Thanks in advance! I apprecate it!
author: wnf

comments.content: It's [Museo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124314/http:/www.exljbris.com/museosans.html). Webfonts are often very easy to suss out if you have access to the page itself, so one suggestion for the future is to provide a link to the source. (In this case: [http://www.rubenbrulat.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124314/http:/www.rubenbrulat.com/ "http://www.rubenbrulat.com/"))

[Museo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124314/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo-sans)  
As a sidenote and as usual for this kind of case, it would have been better to provide the [website url](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124314/http:/www.rubenbrulat.com/). Most of modern menu are using webfonts and by inspecting code and css, answer would have come quicker.
